productData.shortDescription: Boasting a long-lasting battery, the Dolby Atmos technology and a 20.32 cm (8) HD display, thereâ€™s never a dull moment with the Lenovo Tab 4 8. Powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 64-bit quad-core processor, along with 2 GB of RAM, this tablet offers smooth and fast multitasking. Store many videos, songs and e-books on the 16 GB of internal memory.
productData.longDescription:
• 5MP primary camera and 2MP front facing camera
  • 20.32 centimeters (8-inch) capacitive touchscreen with 1280 x 800 pixels resolution
  • iOS v12.1 operating system with 1.4GHz Qualcomm MSM8917 quad core processor, 2GB RAM, 16GB internal memory expandable up to 128GB and single SIM
  • 110 - 120 volts
  • 4800mAH lithium-ion battery
  • 1 year manufacturer warranty for device and 6 months manufacturer warranty for in-box accessories including batteries from the date of purchase
